name: TiVoCommunity XenForo Theme Customization
description: Recolor and modestly adjust the default TiVoCommunity Forum orange default theme to provide a more subtly colored browsing experience.
additional_info: This style is subject to tweaks and other changes as the site continues to tweak the CSS layout having just recently moved to XenForo forum software. Before reporting any issues with the site layout to forum administrators ensure this script isn't causing the problem by temporarily disabling it. Issues with the layout changes provided by this script should be reported to doug@2150.com.
